mapper.insert: insert into food_additive (id, gmt_create, gmt_modify, is_deleted, my_id, cert_code, province, enterprise_name, product_name, homt_address, product_address, details, lussing_time, term_of_validity, explain, reporting_department, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{myId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{homtAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{details,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lussingTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{termOfValidity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{explain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportingDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update food_additive set gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, my_id = #{myId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cert_code = #{certCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enterprise_name = #{enterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, homt_address = #{homtAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_address = #{productAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, details = #{details,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lussing_time = #{lussingTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, term_of_validity = #{termOfValidity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, explain = #{explain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reporting_department = #{reportingDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, gmt_create, gmt_modify, is_deleted, my_id, cert_code, province, enterprise_name, product_name, homt_address, product_address, details, lussing_time, term_of_validity, explain, reporting_department, remark from food_additive where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
